ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Hunting 46-50
ygData.msgSnippet: I actually found it accidentally one day, lol ... ===== ~~~~~~~~~ And on the eighth day God said, O.K. Murphy. You take over.
ygData.messageBody:
I actually found it accidentally one day, lol

--- mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@...> wrote:
> Wow. Never heard of that.
>
> Barto
>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Melanie Johnson
> <melanie_6602@y...>
> wrote:
> > There is also an entrance to JP through Black
> > Burrow... so all the evils can get in and kill the
> > animals... muah ha ha...
> >
> > :)
> > --- Su <suceress@d...> wrote:
> > >
> > > I think Jaggedpine is actually attached to
> surefall
> > > glade. so if you are kos
> > > in surefall you need to be careful. Also, even
> with
> > > a good graphics card it
> > > can be fairly laggy there because of the type of
> > > graphics. I hear there are
> > > some cool things that drop there though. Eye of
> the
> > > Griffon drops there.
> > > It's +10 wisdom but -20 charisma, range slot
> item.
> > > luv,
> > > -Su
> > >


=====
~~~~~~~~~

And on the eighth day God said, "O.K. Murphy. You take over."
